data.message:
Anyone else favorite album? 
Relapse is my favorite 😄😄

replies.message: Yup :D Luv relapse <3
ew
the eminem show, marshall mathers lp and encore
Your all dumb as fuck. Recovery. And Slim Shady LP.
How the fuck is this your favorite album.. Shady him self hated it
Pretty decent album but not my favorite.
It's literally the worst Em album and arguably one of the worst albums of all time
Tyler, come on man. Everybody can have their own opinion. Be cool

Stay Wide Awake is one of the most technically impressive songs he's ever done and there are several others on this album that are incredible. It's not my favorite but to say it's bad is absolutely absurd.
Mmlp is the best. But anyone who hates this album must not have listened to it very much. It's grows on you
Curtain call is mine aswell as recovery.

Its my opinion okay. You don't have to swear at me because of this being my favorite album and yes sslp, tes, and mmlp 1 were awesome too but I like relapse since it involved a lot with shady. And eminem also hated encore too

Eminem said himself that this album isn't his greatest, it actually sucks. Also remember this line. "Encore I was on drugs, Relapse I was flushing them out". He wasn't trying to deal with them anymore. Go Em Go
MMLP, EMINEM Show, SSLP, MMLP2, Recovery, Encore, Relapse...but relapse being last most certainly does NOT mean it's bad!
Funny how he thinks relapse was the worst shit he made lol, it's his worst but way better than most other rappers.
Marshall Mathers LP 1 & 2 , Slim Shady LP and Eminem Show
Its all good?! None of its shit...
Stay wide awake is fucking the best

MMLP, SSLP, Eminem Show are what puts Em at the top of the game... Although IMO he's never put out anything bad, but he does say himself on multiple tracks that he isn't a fan of relapse/refill ... I liked it/them though.

Eminem Show will always be my #1 because that's the first one I ever heard begging to end! 
Second would go to MMLP for sure!
Many people hate it because of the content. But lyrically, it's great.
Recovery, Encore, Marshall Mathers LP2,... I love all albums 😊❤
Beautiful is my favorite song...but the rest of the album has mediocre
His worst album. Under his own admission.
